about_the_game:
The story

In the mystical realm of Eldoria, where the line between reality and fantasy blurs, you awaken in an unfamiliar inn with a mysterious past shrouded in fog. As the protagonist of our tale, with no recollection of your own history and in a different world, your journey in Echoes: Cards of Destiny begins with uncertainty and a blank slate.

Eldoria is not a realm without peril. Dark forces, led by the malevolent Lilith, threaten to plunge the entire world into chaos. The inhabitants of Eldoria, aware of your unique arrival, an Echo, recognize the potential within you to become the key to salvation.

To stand a chance against Lilith and her minions, you must hone your skills as a Card Duelist. Forge bonds with your newfound companions, uncover the mysteries of your own existence, and become the beacon of hope Eldoria desperately needs.

Embark on this epic adventure, where the cards you play and the bonds you forge will echo throughout the ages. Will you unveil the truth behind your origin and emerge victorious against the encroaching darkness? Only time will tell in Echoes: Cards of Destiny.

Gameplay

In Echoes: Cards of Destiny, you explore the world of Eldoria, interact with characters, duel them in epic cardgames and... reap the rewards:
  • A visual novel with insane replayability. There are multiple paths that assure that no playthrough is the same.
  • A addictive card battle system that is easy to master... but you will need to keep improving your deck if you want to stand a chance against the dark forces that loom over Eldoria!
  • All female characters are obtainable with their own CGs and animations
  • Sex... a lot of sex!
  • Exquisite images, from the locations to the CGs to the sexy cards
  • A multitude of atainable cards. Build and improve your deck by winning matches, visiting the towns Card Shop or find even more rare cards in your quests
  • Day/Night system
  • Want to pick up jobs to gain some extra coin? Or go on adventures outside the city outskirts? Maybe you would prefer to spend some time in the courtesan's palace and check the local beauties? Face the local champions in an arena? etc, etc. The choices are many, each passing day you can decide what your future holds.
  • High quality music and sound effects

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Requer um sistema operativo e processador de 64 bits
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Echoes: Cards of Destiny is a immersive adult game that combines captivating storytelling with strategic card game combat mechanics. Dive into a rich narrative where your choices shape not only your destiny, but the world's fate.
